messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: : Breastfeeding
messages.msgSnippet: Enjoy your nursing - IMO it only gets better.  My 3 year old will be nursing forever - she s sure it s not only her privilage but her right .  She loves it
messages.messageBody:
Enjoy your nursing - IMO it only gets better. My 3 year old will be nursing forever - she's sure it's not only her privilage but her 'right'. She loves it and so do I.

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: : Breastfeeding
messages.msgSnippet: *******I was all set to go at least 2 years nursing but Alyssa had other plans for me. I never knew anyone else this happened to ... of course, no one else in
messages.messageBody:
*******I was all set to go at least 2 years nursing but Alyssa had other plans for me.

I never knew anyone else this happened to ... of course, no one else in my family ever nursed their kids. I was so confounded when ds weaned himself, I wrote a story about it. Mothering magazine is going to publish it this year sometime :-P

Kay
